question: In which year, Sabarmati Ashram was established?
explanation: Sabarmati Ashram or Gandhi Ashram (Harijan Ashram, or Satyagraha Ashram) is located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. It was was originally established at the Kocharab Bungalow of Jivanlal Desai (A barrister and friend of Gandhiji) on 25 May 1915. The ashram was relocated to an area on the banks of the river Sabarmati on 17 June 1917. It was the place from where Dandi march was started on 12 March 1930.
